Creating agile solutions together.

Get up, speed up!

We are a group of experts working for simple target: Speeding up your development! Our main target is to research, develop, and invent solutions in collaboration with Digile N4S-Program partners.

We build experiences

Yes, we build products and experiences. Here is collection of works done with N4S@JAMK and Challenge Factory 2014 teams during the N4S-Program.

Contriboard
Contriboard is an open source realtime collaboration tool for teams. It targets primarily tablet and desktop users to enable all team members to participate.
Contriboard
Contriboard Wiki
TOAS Debian Packaging
The repository enables open source community to install and deploy Tieto Open Application Suite for Ubuntu Linux.
TOAS packaging
Unity Mocks
Simulation of prototypes in a natural environment using Unity3D as the rendering engine.
Unity video
Supported By

We are looking for talents all the time. If you have the urge to stay on top of the IT evolution, we would like to hear from you. And if you just want to come and say hello, we are in with that also. Let's improve the process of software delivery together. We have coffee, you can bring some korvapuusti!
